page.title: 02INTRODUCTORY PAGE 2
page.content:
To the north are the cooling towers of {Slough's}industrial estate and also the embanked{M4 Motorway.
But for the aeroplanes from nearby {Heathrow,}this would be a very peaceful area set in the midst of noisy and busy towns.
{Dorney, Boveney and Eton Wick}are all linked by the B{3026}but public transport is infrequent and non_existent on Sundays which means the villages are fairly isolated.
{Clewer}to the south of the river has no connection with the other three villages but is adjacent to{Windsor and lies on the A308 linking{Windsor {and Maidenhead.
